trans-unit.source: Asynchronously runs one workflow from another.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> first calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking> code-beside method, if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> 首先调用 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking> 代码旁置方法（如果指定了此方法）。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method is used to set up incoming parameters for the workflow instance to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此方法用于为要调用的工作流实例设置传入参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> then creates and invokes a workflow instance of the specified type, passing the parameters that are provided.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> 然后创建并调用指定类型的工作流实例，同时传递所提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: As soon as the workflow is invoked, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> finishes immediately.
trans-unit.target: 工作流一经调用后，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> 就会立即完成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity" /> class.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the newly created workflow instance.
The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the newly created workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 指示新创建工作流实例的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is started the <xref:System.Guid> of the created instance is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.InstanceId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 工作流开始后，即会将所创建实例的 <xref:System.Guid> 分配给 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.InstanceId%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is a bindable property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是一种可绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: The instance can be retrieved in the code-beside.
trans-unit.target: 可以在代码旁置中检索该实例。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.InstanceId" /> property.
Occurs before the workflow is invoked.
This event is typically used for setting up workflow invoke parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于设置工作流调用参数。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking" /> event.
Gets the collection of parameters to bind to.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection" /> that contains the parameter bindings for the workflow being called.
trans-unit.target: 包含正在调用的工作流的参数绑定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection" />.
The parameters in this collection are the parameters required to invoke the child workflow.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的参数是调用子工作流所必需的参数。

trans-unit.source: This collection can only specify inbound parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此集合只能指定入站参数。

trans-unit.source: Outbound and reference parameters cannot be specified, because the workflow invocation is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定出站参数和引用参数，因为工作流调用是异步的。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.ParameterBindingsProperty" /> property.
The type that the workflow must filter.
<see langword="true" /> to throw an error if the specified Type cannot be filtered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be filtered by the workflow.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be filtered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="throwonError" /> is <see langword="true" />.
This indicates that <paramref name="type" /> is a design time type.
<paramref name="type" /> is not the root activity.
Gets a description of the filter being used by the workflow.
The description of the filter being used by the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 正在由工作流使用的筛选器的说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow to be invoked.
The fully-qualified name of the workflow to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的工作流的完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.TargetWorkflow" /> property.
